text:
............
We're short on time for basics and...

Hello? Yes, we're tackling something quite
challenging with a standard band setup...

It's contemporary dance. Both of them are really
ambitious about creating the stage.

...But, it's just that we're short on time, and what we're
working on is quite significant, so whether we can finish it...

...No, what's the point if I don't believe?
We have to support them fully to get it done.

...I'm sorry for taking up your time.
I'll organize things when I get back.

I think those are good choices. But, we probably can't
have an orchestra, right? Should I introduce a pianist?

...I'd like to consider that too.
Indeed, keeping it simple with just piano might work.

Also, just voices could be good. Improvising
with tone clusters... but do we need a chorus?

...No, couldn't we loop the voices
on the spot and layer them?

"Nanakusa-san, it seems like you don't
have much time for dance practice."

"If you're clinging to something
that seems impossible..."
"It'll become a bigger inconvenience for the unit."
